channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ディズニー、コスト削減目標を55億ドルから75億ドルに引き上げ、ボブ・アイガーは主にリニアTVからの削減を示唆、2024年第4四半期までにストリーミングの利益を予測（Samantha Delouya/CNN）
item.description:
Samantha Delouya / CNN:
Disney raises its cost savings goal from $5.5B to $7.5B; Bob Iger suggests cuts will come primarily from linear TV and predicts streaming profits by Q4 2024  —  Los Angeles CNN —  The Walt Disney Company missed Wall Street's expectations Wednesday when the company reported weaker-than-expected revenue for the past quarter.

item.title: ディズニーのボブ・アイガーCEOは、Disney+とHuluを組み合わせたアプリのベータテストを2023年12月に開始し、2024年春に正式ローンチすると述べている（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Disney CEO Bob Iger says a beta test of an app combining Disney+ and Hulu will launch in December 2023 and an official launch will follow in spring 2024  —  Disney, which is in the home stretch of swinging the deal to become the full owner of Hulu, will launch a beta test of an app next month …

item.title: グラミー賞の元CEOニール・ポートナウ氏が2018年に薬物を飲まされてレイプされ、レコーディング・アカデミーは彼女の主張を調査する義務を怠ったとして、女性が提訴した（Ben Sisario/New York Times）。
item.description:
Ben Sisario / New York Times:
A woman sues former Grammy Awards CEO Neil Portnow, claiming he drugged and raped her in 2018 and the Recording Academy was negligent in investigating her claim  —  The woman, who is not named in the lawsuit, said that she was drugged by Neil Portnow, and that the Recording Academy was negligent in investigating her complaint.

item.title: ディズニー、第4四半期の売上高は予想213.3億ドルに対し前年同期比5％増の212.4億ドル、純利益は2.64億ドル、Disney+の新規加入者数はコアで700万人、Hotstarを含む総加入者数は1.502万人（Sarah Whitten/CNBC）
item.description:
Sarah Whitten / CNBC:
Disney reports Q4 revenue up 5% YoY to $21.24B vs. $21.33B expected, net income of $264M, and 7M new core Disney+ subs, with total of 150.2M including Hotstar  —  - Disney reported quarterly earnings after the closing bell.  — Profit topped expectations, but revenue came up short.

item.title: 11月8日、WBDのCFOが米国の広告市場は「期待していたよりも弱い」状態が続いており、2024年の回復も予断を許さないと説明したため、WBDの株価は16％以上下落した（Jill Goldsmith/Deadline）
item.description:
Jill Goldsmith / Deadline:
WBD shares fell 16%+ on November 8 after its CFO described a US ad market that continues “to be weaker than we had hoped”, and an unpredictable 2024 recovery  —  - WBD CEO David Zaslav “Hopeful” For Resolution To SAG-AFTRA Strike As He Touts Studios' Final Offer; Hints At M&A

item.title: 映画『スーパーマリオブラザーズ・ムービー』の大成功を受け、ソニーと提携してゼルダの実写映画を制作する任天堂の映画プッシュの様子（Gearoid Reidy/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Gearoid Reidy / Bloomberg:
A look at Nintendo's movie push, as the company partners with Sony to work on a Zelda live-action movie, after the huge success of The Super Mario Bros. Movie  —  It's dangerous to go alone, and in teaming up with Sony and the man who made Marvel successful, Nintendo shows it has learned from past mistakes.

item.title: SiriusXMは新しいロゴを発表し、月額9.99ドルの安価なストリーミング・オールアクセス・プランとともに新しいアプリをデビューさせる計画で、12月14日に北米に登場する（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
SiriusXM rolls out a new logo and plans to debut a new app alongside a cheaper $9.99 per month Streaming All Access Plan, coming to North America on December 14  —  SiriusXM rolled out a new logo, a brand-new app — with a cheaper monthly streaming plan — and a slate of new channels and shows …

item.title: NBCニュースが、2020年米選挙否定論を推進し、『2000ミュール』を制作したセーレム・メディアと第3回共和党予備選討論会で提携したことを専門家が批判（Jeremy Barr/Washington Post）
item.description:
Jeremy Barr / Washington Post:
Experts criticize NBC News for partnering with Salem Media, which promotes 2020 US election denialism and produced 2000 Mules, for the third GOP primary debate  —  How Salem Media Group — a powerful network of pro-Trump talk-radio programming and producer of the discredited ‘2000 Mules’ documentary …

item.title: 司会者キャロル・ヴォーダーマンがBBCラジオ・ウェールズの番組を辞め、政治的意見の表明に関するBBCの新しいソーシャルメディア・ルールによって「黙らされることはない」と語った（Alexandra Topping/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Alexandra Topping / The Guardian:
Presenter Carol Vorderman quits her BBC Radio Wales show, saying she will “not be silenced” by the BBC's new social media rules on voicing political opinions  —  Presenter says bosses had decided she ‘must leave’ after she continued to express political opinions online

item.title: 2024年の米国選挙を前に、マイクロソフトは米国の政治家がディープフェイクと戦うために動画や写真を認証するための透かしツールを無料で提供する予定だ（Margi Murphy/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Margi Murphy / Bloomberg:
Ahead of the 2024 US election, Microsoft plans to offer a free watermarking tool to help US politicians authenticate their videos and photos to fight deepfakes  —  - Tool offering comes as concerns grow over fake photos, videos  — Microsoft says Russia is ‘huge’ cyber, disinformation threat

item.title: パンドラの箱』からの抜粋：Netflixがオリジナルとビンジウォッチングでいかにエンターテインメント業界を変えたかを詳述（Peter Biskind/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Peter Biskind / The Hollywood Reporter:
An excerpt from “Pandora's Box: How Guts, Guile, and Greed Upended TV” details how Netflix changed the entertainment industry with Originals and binge-watching  —  The inside story of how the streamer muscled its way to the top by defying the industry's conventions — and eventually paid the price.

item.title: Netflix映画部門会長スコット・ステューバーへのインタビュー：クオリティを重視して年間公開本数を減らすこと、入札競争についてより慎重になることなど（Brent Lang/Variety）
item.description:
Brent Lang / Variety:
An interview with Chairman of Netflix Film Scott Stuber on releasing fewer films per year in a bet on quality, being more selective about bidding wars, and more  —  In 2018, “Saturday Night Live” captured the public perception of Netflix as a ceaseless river of content.

item.title: スポティファイは、10月3日に英国とオーストラリアでサービスを開始した後、米国の有料会員に毎月20万冊以上のオーディオブックに15時間無料でアクセスできるサービスを提供するようになった（Caitlin Huston/Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Caitlin Huston / Hollywood Reporter:
Spotify now offers US paid subscribers 15 hours of free access to 200K+ audiobooks per month, after launching the service in the UK and Australia on October 3  —  The podcast and music platform will offer U.S. paid subscribers 15 hours of free listening to audiobooks as it continues its rollout of the new offering.

item.title: IAC、第3四半期の売上高は前年同期比15％減の$11.1B、純損失は前年同期比512％増の$3.90.5M、ドットダッシュの売上高は前年同期比11％減の$4.17.5M、アンジの売上高は前年同期比25％減の$3.71.8M（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
IAC reports Q3 revenue down 15% YoY to $1.11B, net loss up 512% YoY to $390.5M, Dotdash revenue down 11% YoY to $417.5M, and Angi sales down 25% YoY to $371.8M  —  Internet holding company IAC (IAC.O) beat Wall Street third-quarter revenue estimates on Tuesday, as the owner …

item.title: ネクスター、第3四半期の純収入は前年同期比10.8%減の$1.1B、調整後EBITDAは同51.9%減の$236M、CWは$60Mの赤字、コア広告収入は2.3%減の$391M（Jennifer Maas/Variety）
item.description:
Jennifer Maas / Variety:
Nexstar reports Q3 net revenue down 10.8% YoY to $1.1B, adjusted EBITDA down 51.9% YoY to $236M, a $60M loss for the CW, and core ad revenue down 2.3% to $391M  —  Nexstar reported its third-quarter 2023 earnings Wednesday, revealing TV ad revenue was down overall 23% for the July-September quarter.
